title: The Dan Bongino Sunday Special 04/17/22
description:
First up today we talk with Christopher Rufo who got hold of the Disney internal videos showing how higher ups at the company were pushing the trans agenda to young children. Next we have North Carolina Lt. Gov. Mark Robinson talking to us about a powerful speech he made in a church about protecting our children from those pushing extreme agendas. Finally we had Julie Kelly from American Greatness who talked with us about the DOJ’s failure in the prosecution of the “Michigan Militia” in the supposed plot to kidnap Gretchen Whitmer.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

First up today we talk with Christopher Rufo who got hold of the Disney internal videos showing how higher ups at the company were pushing the trans agenda to young children. Next we have North Carolina Lt. Gov. Mark Robinson talking to us about a powerful speech he made in a church about protecting our children from those pushing extreme agendas. Finally we had Julie Kelly from American Greatness who talked with us about the DOJ’s failure in the prosecution of the “Michigan Militia” in the supposed plot to kidnap Gretchen Whitmer.
